description: Get all reviews for chrome extension marketplace

spreadsheetUrl.label: Spreadsheet URL or a Extension review URL
spreadsheetUrl.helper: Enter either a Google Spreadsheet URL or a CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available) or a Extension review URL

extensionsPerLaunch.label: Number of extensions review to scrape per launch
extensionsPerLaunch.helper: If this field is empty, the API will scrape all extensions
